1.title: Queen Grenadine
1.plot: Daddy and Mommy leave Grenadine and Peppermint the Queen's palace when they go off for the weekend.

2.title: The Red Boots
2.plot: Peppermint is about to receive a Golden Lemming from the Queen for having invented broccoli gel.

3.title: The Skeleton Ghost
3.plot: Grenadine, Peppermint and Soda play a game of "monster cards" and inadvertently wake up Ahki, the Skeleton Ghost.

4.title: The Wandering Castle
4.plot: Grenadine and Peppermint discover that the Queen's castle has disappeared.

5.title: T's A Yurk Yurk Yurk Yurk World
5.plot: Back from a fishing trip, Grenadine, Peppermint and Soda realize that a sort of collective madness has invaded the ice field.

6.title: The Hammer of Thor
6.plot: Ricotta makes an amazing discovery: Thor's Hammer. It's a Viking hammer.

7.title: Little Red Frozen Hood
7.plot: There's a big blizzard on the ice field. The Freezeberg are trapped in their igloo.

8.title: The Fashion Squadron
8.plot: Daddy has gone to hunt for the dangerous Mad Seal, but he doesn't come back from his hunting expedition.

9.title: The Cuddly Code
9.plot: During a fishing expedition on the ice field, Mascarpone puts Ricotta's life in danger and so transgresses the famous Cuddly Code.

10.title: Arctic Orange
10.plot: Strange: the whole forest is covered with orange snow which smells like rotten fish. Where does this catastrophe come from?

11.title: The Night of Ijirak
11.plot: It's the Night of Ijirak during which the monster roams around the ice field, looking for someone's memory to eat.

12.title: The Shopping Cart Race
12.plot: Captain Kelp organizes a shopping cart race in his supermarket.

13.title: Danger Lighthouse
13.plot: The highest lighthouse on the ice field is out of order and some old Sea Thieves decide to pillage all the fishing boats that have run aground.

14.title: The Time Travel Booth
14.plot: Using one of Kelp's defective phone cards, Grenadine and Peppermint wind up in the prehistoric ice era.

15.title: The Song of Broccoli
15.plot: To promote his new frozen broccoli, Kelp sets up a big poetry contest.

16.title: The Gloof Championship
16.plot: Like every year on the ice field, different families get ready to face off in the big Gloof Fight who determines the strongest member of the clan.

17.title: Tardzilla
17.plot: Grenadine and Peppermint wake up Tadzilla, a monster who as sleeping under the ice for ages.

18.title: Super Peppermint and Mister Penguin
18.plot: Peppermint drinks a magic potion and turns into a mischievous penguin.

19.title: The Dahoo on a Hunt
19.plot: Kelp bets Grenadine, Soda and Peppermint that the Dahoo doesn't exist.

20.title: Penguin on a Hunt
20.plot: Grenadine leads Peppermint to fishing school in order to catch the Sumo fish, the biggest fish on the ice field.

21.title: The Curse of Lemmings
21.plot: Panic in Lemmings city: their sacred statue of their goddess Lucette has disappeared.

22.title: The Jackhammerhead Shark
22.plot: Queen Blizzard organizes a contest of ice sculpture. Grenadine wants Peppermint to create a huge ice Ã©lÃ©phant.

23.title: Panic at the News Paper
23.plot: Back from a dangerous mission, Grenadine promises a day of rest to Peppermint.

24.title: The Bermuda Shorts Triangle
24.plot: Grenadine decides to go off on a fishing expedition with Peppermint to find the infamous Turbo Fish.

25.title: Manatee Overboard
25.plot: It'll soon be Saint Valentine day and Soda is preparing his declaration for Grenadine.

26.title: Knitting Mission
26.plot: To stop the Masked Foxes from stealing seagull eggs, Mom knits them some nice pouches.

1.title: Like a Penguin in the Air
1.plot: Peppermint is the laughing stock of a group of female penguins. He's the kind of penguin who can't fly.

2.title: The Fishing Hole
2.plot: Grenadine wants to beat her dad at ice-fishing and goes looking for a special ice saw with Peppermint at the Hypergloo.

3.title: Dangerous birthday
3.plot: It's the best day in the world on the ice field: Grenadine's birthday. Mommy Freezeberg sends Peppermint on a mission to keep Grenadine away while she and Daddy prepare a surprise party!

4.title: The Ice Mammoth
4.plot: Grenadine gets bored at Frigid the Bear's survival camp. She wants an exotic adventure with elephants. Peppermint falls through the ice and finds an ice mammoth!

5.title: Heroes Don't Get Cold Feet
5.plot: Peppermint has cold feet and Grenadine wonders how a penguin can be so sensitive to the cold. She dares him to spend a whole night outside.

6.title: Aurora Borealis
6.plot: An aurora borealis lights up the ice-field sky and Grenadine hugs her mom who's name happens to be Aurora.

7.title: Save the White whale
7.plot: A strange sound is heard on the ice field: a whale has beached herself and Grenadine and Peppermint decide to put her back out to see.

8.title: The Treasure of the Red Fennec
8.plot: Soda has asked his dad for a miniature submarine after finding a treasure map in the attic.

9.title: The super-adorable Snowman
9.plot: Captain Kelp tells everyone that a horrible yeti has attacked him and ends up selling all sorts of yeti traps.

10.title: The Masked Wolf
10.plot: Lazlo the wolf is fed up with falling on the ice and decides to steal super Peppermint's special sock to become a super-villain on the ice-field.

11.title: The Icecube Festival
11.plot: According to tradition, everyone has to put an ice cube on their welcome mat and they'll have good luck for the rest of the year.

12.title: Elementary, my dear penguin!
12.plot: Aurora Freezeberg sets up a fashion week on the ice field with her own hand-crafted fashions for the Queen.

13.title: The Gloozard knight
13.plot: For her great Blizzard Ball, the Queen is looking for a mysterious dancing partner. But he suddenly disappears.

14.title: Luke Lemming has disappeared
14.plot: The Lemmings ask Grenadine and Peppermint to help them find their pal Luke Lemming who has disappeared.

15.title: The Christmas Penguin
15.plot: After becoming amnesic because of Captain Kelp, Santa Claus has forgotten everything about Christmas and thinks he's a penguin.

16.title: Wild Broccolis
16.plot: Peppermint volunteers his services as a super chef for the Queen's yearly social tea. He plans to make some delicious wild broccoli ice cream.

17.title: The Peppershongshong
17.plot: To convince Soda of going out and playing, Grenadine and Peppermint suggest they go find the only animal he doesn't know: the Peppershongshong!

18.title: Mission Suppository
18.plot: Doctor Suppose's famous cod-liver oil suppositories disappear just as Daddy Freezeberg falls ill with a nasty ice field flue.

19.title: Hiccups on Ice
19.plot: Peppermint wants to avoid the traditional Spring Swim in the Arctic Ocean. Frigid winds up with a nasty contagious case of the hiccups and soon the whole ice field is contaminated...

20.title: Frankengloostein
20.plot: During a nighttime storm, lightning strikes Frank, the snowman that Grenadine and Peppermint have just made.

21.title: Radio Icicle
21.plot: Catastrophe at Radio Glagla, Meg Ahertz has lost his voice. Someone has to replace him while he convalesces.

22.title: Cousin Blizzard
22.plot: The ice field is suddenly thrown into pandemonium due to a mysterious blizzard.

23.title: Gloo Beach
23.plot: To fill his cash register, Captain Kelp launches a beach thanks to a fake Hyper Sun.

24.title: The Gluttuna
24.plot: The Queen offers a reward to anyone who will solve the mystery of the disappearing fishermen.

25.title: The Gloos Race
25.plot: The annual Windy Gloo race gets Grenadine into the action with Daddy and Peppermint.

26.title: The Tupilak
26.plot: Daddy tells Grenadine and Peppermint the Inuit legend of the Tupilak, a monster who emerges from the icy depths when a magic formula is uttered.

1.title: The Big Battle
1.plot: Peppermint teams up with Grenadine for the annual snowball championship.

2.title: Haglooween
2.plot: Halloween turns into a nightmare when some jumping pumpkins invade the Queen's Palace.

3.title: The Mermaid of Willy Nilly
3.plot: Grenadine and Peppermint find out that Captain Kelp has hired a mermaid to hypnotize his customers into buying anything.

5.title: Crazy About Grenadine
5.plot: Peppermint breaks a bottle of Grenadine's favorite perfume. He comes up with a replacement with weird side effects: Soda falls in love with Grenadine.

6.title: The Sea Snail Genie
6.plot: During a fishing expedition, Grenadine and Peppermint find a Sea Snail Geenie who can grant anyone three wishes.

7.title: The Tooth Shrimp
7.plot: Grenadine loses a tooth and tells Peppermint about the small shrimp tooth fairy who comes to get it in the night and turn it into an elephant tusk.

8.title: The Mother of the Sea
8.plot: Peppermint offends The Mother of the Sea by denigrating fish.

9.title: The Little White Men
9.plot: One fine morning, Grenadine and Peppermint discover strange footprints all over the ice field.

10.title: A Hairy Situation
10.plot: Everybody's yak fur clothes disappear. A real tragedy for the Queen who needs her coat for a ceremony.

11.title: The Big Crack
11.plot: A huge crack in the ice field splits the village in two. Grenadine and Peppermint are suddenly separated from Mom and Dad and the rest of their friends.

12.title: The Skating King
12.plot: Soda would love to become a figure-skating champion. Fearing for his son's safety, Kelp builds a super-safe skating rink using Dad's iceberg.

13.title: Varech 9000
13.plot: Grenadine, Peppermint and Soda suddenly become prisoners of Kelp's super-duper security system.

14.title: The Ballad of Fu-penguin
14.plot: The incredible Master Fu Penguin comes to the ice field to demonstrate his kung fu.

16.title: Polar Night
16.plot: The sun doesn't show up in the sky one morning and Grenadine gets worried.

17.title: Pirate Like Daddy
17.plot: When Soda tells his father he has no intention of becoming a pirate, Captain Kelp goes on a rampage.

18.title: Freezeberg Junior
18.plot: Grenadine finds an egg on the igloo's stoop. She's sure it's an elephant egg.

19.title: The Caribou Rebellion
19.plot: Grenadine and Peppermint are preparing a surprise birthday party for the Queen.

20.title: Grenadine's Circus
20.plot: Grenadine is sad to think that she'll never get to see her dream circus elephant.

21.title: The Cuddly Muncher
21.plot: The Cuddly Muncher is a legendary being tht eats cuddly toys. It's wandering around in the Queen's palace and kidnaps poor Mascarpone.

22.title: Iceberg Straight Ahead
22.plot: A huge iceberg is heading dangerously close to the ice field. There's bound to be a disaster.

23.title: The Snow Star
23.plot: Soda shows Grenadine and Peppermint the constellations int he sky. But suddenly, one of the stars seems to fall out of the sky and straight to the ground.

24.title: Big Chef Peppermint
24.plot: Peppermint has just written a cookbook for broccoli. It's a big success, much to Grenadine's surprise.

25.title: Marie-Gloo Where Are You?
25.plot: Frigid the Bear has bought up all the food in the Hypergloo, leaving everyone else on the ice field high and dry and without supplies.

26.title: Hyper Penguin
26.plot: Tired of playing super-hero for Grenadine, Peppermint is about to tell her a thing or two when a meteorite falls to Earth and gives him real super powers.

imdb.title: Grenadine & Mentalo
plot: The series tells the story of a little Inuit girl who is curious, energetic and who loves to get into mischief.
